text: Jamal Chavoshifar (; also Romanized as "Jamāl Chāvoshifar", IPA: ʤæ'mɒːl ʧɒːvoʃiː'fæɾ, born 1990) is an Iranian swimmer, who specialized in backstroke events. == Swimming career == Born on 19 August, 1990 into a family of sportsmen and encouraged by his father, Jamal Chavoshifar engaged in swimming as a child. At first he chose the breaststroke and won the first medal of his life in one of its styles. But he gradually inclined to the butterfly stroke, and finally began his specialty, that is the backstroke, at the age of sixteen. در مسیر کسب سهمیهٔ المپیک/ چاوشی‌فر: هرچه در توان داشتم گذاشته‌ام (Website of the Iranian Federation of Swimming, Diving and Water Polo; 18 June, 2016) In his first abroad competition, Jamal managed to break the 50m and 100m backstroke records of Iran at the Malaysian Competitions in 2008, when he was eighteen.جمال چاوشی‌فر: ۲۴ بار رکوردهای ملی را جابه‌جا کرده‌ام (Esfahan Emrooz website; 31 January, 2018) Chavoshifar holds the Iranian records of 50, 100, and 200 m events of the backstroke in short course pools, as well as the records of 50 and 100 m events of the same style in long course pools. He has been continuously improving his records during his championship period. در مسیر کسب سهمیهٔ المپیک/ چاوشی‌فر: هرچه در توان داشتم گذاشته‌ام (Website of the Iranian Federation of Swimming, Diving and Water Polo; 18 June, 2016) === Historic records === * Chavoshifar is the first Iranian swimmer to swim the 100m backstroke in less than a minute. * Chavoshifar is the first Iranian swimmer to swim the 50m backstroke in less than 26 seconds. * Chavoshifar is the first Iranian swimmer to gain the entrance record of the backstroke for WorldSkills Kazan 2019 in Russia.Wikipedia: List of Iranian records in swimming#MenWikipedia: List of Iranian records in swimming#Men2 === Team records === In addition to the above-mentioned records, Chavoshifar holds the records of the three events of long course relay 4×100m, short course relay 4×50m, and short course relay 4×100m. === Best results === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Event ! Time ! Venue ! date |- | 50 m backstroke (Short course) | 25.40 (NR) | Doha, Qatar World Championships | 5 December 2014 |- | 100 m backstroke (Short course) | 55.03 (NR) | Doha, Qatar World Championships | 3 December 2014 |- | 200 m backstroke (Short course) | 2:03:39 (NR) | Doha, Qatar World Championships | 7 December 2014 |} جمال چاوشی‌فر بازهم رکورد زد (Website of the Iranian Federation of Swimming, Diving and Water Polo; 3 December, 2014)درخشش و رکوردشکنی چاوشی‌فر و نسیمی‌شاد (Website of the Iranian Federation of Swimming, Diving and Water Polo; 5 April 2015)صعود جمال چاوشی‌فر به نیمه‌نهایی ۱۰۰ متر کرال پشت (Website of the Iranian Federation of Swimming, Diving and Water Polo; 28 June, 2015) چاووشی‌فر بازهم رکورد ایران را شکست (Website of the Iranian Federation of Swimming, Diving and Water Polo; 22 September, 2014) چاوشی‌فر رکورد زد و جهانی شد (Varzesh 3 website; 4 July 2015)رکورد کرال پشت ایران بازهم جابه‌جا شد/ جمال چاوشی‌فر رکورد خودش را شکست (Khabaronline website; 22 September, 2014)چاوشی‌فر و قندچی رکورد ملی را شکستند (Tabnak; 7 Dec., 2014) == See also == * List of Iranian records in swimming ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian male swimmers Category:Male backstroke swimmers Category:Sportspeople from Isfahan Category:Swimmers at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Swimmers at the 2014 Asian Games
title: Jamal Chavoshifar
